post.body: Thanks for the follow! Can you believe what is happening in this game?
@rhondacarpenter Thanks for the follow! Have a great weekend! :)
i am way too easily distracted today, lol
back from running errands now me thinks it's time to take down the Christmas tree
alright, time to run some errands and hit up the grocery store - later tweeps :)
moirning tweeps
The Twitter Happiness score for MusicalityBard is: 560. http://happytweets.com
alright, time to figure out something productive to do with the rest of my day...
*sigh* Good try Bulls
Oh....My...God...that did not just happen...
boo they didn't show either marching band during the half time
Halftime: UB - 20 UCONN - 17 GO BULLS!!
sweet! the Sabres are winning 2-0 - Looks like it's going to be a good day for Buffalo sports! :)
yes I have an unhealthy obsession with football - especially since my alma mater is in a bowl game for the 1st time ever! :D
Un-BULL-ievable!!!!!! LET GO BULLS! :D
I so wish I was in Toronto right now at the game
YES!!!! UB forces a fumble and recovers the ball! *dances*
this is gonna be a nailbiting game lol :) but I won't be giving up on my Bulls :D They deserve it!
*sigh* or you could go and give them a touchdown
woot Buffalo's first on the board 3-0 Keep it up boys!!!
